Title: Imposes a highway use fee on outdoor advertising; establishes a New York state urban reforestation fund and makes provisions supporting urban forestry
Summary: Imposes a highway use fee on outdoor advertising; establishes a New York state urban reforestation fund from fees imposed on outdoor advertising; makes provisions supporting urban forestry.
LawCode: Amd ยง88, Hway L; add ยง91-h, St Fin L; amd ยง53-0303, add ยง53-0309, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, the state finance law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to imposing a highway use fee on outdoor advertising, establishing a New York state urban reforestation fund and making provisions supporting urban forestry
